currentlyReading.title: How Great Ideas Happen
currentlyReading.author: George Newman
currentlyReading.alt: Book cover of How Great Ideas Happen by George Newman
currentlyReading.review: A book that finally gets at the core of creativity—that it doesn't truly come from within and it's not a solo activity. It comes from a process of discovery that may or may not yield anything to pursue.
